attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After obtaining over a million signatures to petition against the proposed nationwide congestion charging, this Government blatantly ignored everybodys feelings and are due to press ahead regardless!
please sign this petiton to ask this Government to listen to the petitoners and practice what they preach DEMOCRACY!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
